Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its damage by 15.

description: Dimensional folding is not fully understood in any capacity.  A parachute and medical supplies are best kept on hand!
name: Wormhole Generator: Northrend

spell.description: Creates an unstable wormhole the Engineer can use to travel around Northrend.  Lasts 1 min.

spell.name: Jeeves
spell.description:
Requests the presence of Jeeves, the perfect gentleman robot butler, who will attend to your needs for 10 min.



Jeeves can grant bank access to very skilled engineers and perform mundane tasks such as buying, selling, and repairing for anyone.

description: Random quantity of essence or dust.
name: Essence or Dust

spell.description:
Inflicts 450 Fire damage and incapacitates targets in a 5 yard radius for 4 sec.  Any damage will break the effect.



This is one potent bomb!  Back off punk!

Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that sometimes increases ranged attack power by 800 for 10 sec when dealing damage with ranged attacks.



Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.

spell.description:
Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases ranged hit by 88.



Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.

Removes the safety mechanism from a bow or gun, increasing its ranged haste by 88.



Using this kit causes the bow or gun to become soulbound.

description: Nearly as complicated to operate as it is to make.
name: High-Powered Bolt Gun

description: Good luck.
name: Trans-Dimensional Fabricator

spell.name: Teleport With Error
spell.description: Teleports you exactly where you want to go... if you aren't too picky.

spell.name: Deck of Trades
spell.description: Flip a card to see your fortune.

description: Be cautious in your daily quests.
name: Fortune Card

description: You are very fortunate!
name: Fortune Card

description: A friend asks for your time. A guild asks for your money.
name: Fortune Card

description: Your racial leader is thinking about you.
name: Fortune Card

description: Beware of a tall night elf with one blond boot.
name: Fortune Card

description: You're going to be rich!
name: Fortune Card

description: Life is short; you should take more chances.
name: Fortune Card

spell.name: Volatile Seaforium Blastpack
spell.description: Blasts open locked doors and chests that require lockpicking skill of 400 and below.

spell.name: Loot-A-Rang
spell.description: Retrieves the loot from a nearby corpse.

spell.name: Alchemy Tarot
spell.description: Permanently increases your skill in Alchemy by 1, up to a maximum of 150.

spell.name: Alchemy Tarot
spell.description: Permanently increases your skill in Alchemy by 150, up to a maximum of 225.

spell.name: Alchemy Tarot
spell.description: Permanently increases your skill in Alchemy by 225, up to a maximum of 300.

spell.name: Alchemy Tarot
spell.description: Permanently increases your skill in Alchemy by 300, up to a maximum of 375.

spell.name: Alchemy Tarot
spell.description: Permanently increases your skill in Alchemy by 375, up to a maximum of 450.

description: Commonly obtained when milling Cinderbloom, Stormvine, Azshara's Veil, Heartblossom, Twilight Jasmine, and Whiptail.
name: Ashen Pigment

description: Rarely obtained when milling Cinderbloom, Stormvine, Azshara's Veil, Heartblossom, Twilight Jasmine, and Whiptail.
name: Burning Embers

description: A random Darkmoon Card of Destruction.  Collect a full set to receive a reward.
name: Darkmoon Card of Destruction

description: As the purse is emptied, the rogue's heart fills.
name: Fortune Card

description: You aren't very lucky.  Yet.
name: Fortune Card

description: You might have better luck with another fortune.
name: Fortune Card

description: Stay away from mystery meat.
name: Fortune Card

description: You really should've looted that spider.
name: Fortune Card

description: Never trust an honest goblin or a sober dwarf.
name: Fortune Card

description: You'll never know until you loot.
name: Fortune Card

description: Your future is clouded with a purple rain.
name: Fortune Card

description: You will hear the tinkling of golden coins.
name: Fortune Card

description: Trust in the Light, but watch your mount.
name: Fortune Card

description: Never stand in the shadow of dragons.
name: Fortune Card

description: The road to Blackrock Mountain is paved with good intentions.
name: Fortune Card

description: Many raid wipes are in your immediate future.
name: Fortune Card

description: Epics are like children; none are so wonderful as your own.
name: Fortune Card

description: Experience, honor points and faction reputation are in the days ahead.
name: Fortune Card

description: Your greatest fortune is in the friends you have.  Especially tanks.
name: Fortune Card

description: The future looks cataclysmic.
name: Fortune Card

description: Find beauty in ordinary things. Vendor them for cash.
name: Fortune Card

description: One who promises to go on a blind date is bound on pickup.
name: Fortune Card

description: A Shaman's blessing is elementary.
name: Fortune Card

description: Your outlook looks bright, unless you run into Deathwing.
name: Fortune Card

description: You have a good chance to roll 100 in the near future.
name: Fortune Card

description: You will develop a great sense of relaxation (and patience) from the fishing profession.
name: Fortune Card

description: You will someday be able to afford that mount.
name: Fortune Card

description: IT IS TIME TO REORDER! For more fortunes, contact F.B. Krazzlestix, Bilgewater Harbor. Bulk discounts available for a small fee.
name: Fortune Card

description: You have many hidden talents. You will gain more with experience.
name: Fortune Card

description: He who fights an army is a martyr; he who fights five is elite.
name: Fortune Card

description: A light heart carries you through bad Battlegrounds.
name: Fortune Card

description: All of the effort you are making is worth the repair costs.
name: Fortune Card

description: Never trust a troll. Or a rogue. Especially a troll rogue.
name: Fortune Card

description: Disbelief destroys the magic.
name: Fortune Card

description: Now is the time to try something new. Perhaps a new tradeskill.
name: Fortune Card

description: Every herb blooms in its own sweet time. Then you pick it!
name: Fortune Card

description: Go take a rest. You deserve it. Remember to rest in an inn though!
name: Fortune Card

description: He who expects a wipe will never be disappointed.
name: Fortune Card

description: Never look up when there are flying mounts above you.
name: Fortune Card

description: You will inherit a large sum of money. You will blow it at the Auction House.
name: Fortune Card

description: Someone nearby wants to /flirt with you.
name: Fortune Card

description: Your talents will be recognized and rewarded. Provided your talent spec is good.
name: Fortune Card

description: Help! I'm being held prisoner in a fortune cookie bakery!
name: Fortune Card

description: The sun will shine tomorrow.
name: Fortune Card

description: You will receive a gift from someone you hate.
name: Fortune Card

description: The beginning of wisdom is to desire it. The end of wisdom is to theorycraft.
name: Fortune Card

description: You will live a long, happy life with many resurrections along the way.
name: Fortune Card

description: The path of the faceroller is not the path to wisdom.
name: Fortune Card

description: All that glitters is not gold.  But you can sell it for gold most of the time.
name: Fortune Card

description: You will give someone a piece of your mind, which you can ill afford.
name: Fortune Card

description: When life gives you lemons, pay for repair costs.
name: Fortune Card

description: A feather in the hand is worth a Levitate.
name: Fortune Card

description: Your lucky numbers are: 4 8 15 16 23 42
name: Fortune Card

description: You have many friends and very few living enemies.
name: Fortune Card

description: These clever little devils burrow into Abyssal Clams and devour them from the inside.
name: Blood Shrimp
